RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 78. Starter Allowance Purse 20000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS SINCE FEBRUARY 9, 2022. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 9 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since December 9 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KATY THE CAT was reserved early, advanced three wide on the turn, came four wide into the lane and closed well to get up late to prove best, driving. TERPEYE was outrun early, came three wide into the lane, angled out by the furlong marker and closed the gap fast on the outside. MELODIOUS SINGER prompted the early pace four wide, made a three wide bid leaving the turn to take command and was clear by the furlong marker, then failed to last late and lost the place award as well. ROSES FROM HEAVEN was settled early, four wide on the turn and came six wide into the lane and had a late rally but needed more. POSITIVE FORCE rushed up on the inside to vie for command by the half mile marker, then rated back on the turn, swung out five wide leaving the turn and faded. SOUTH HOUSE pressed the pace three wide early, made a bide to vie for command between rivals on the turn, shifted out leaving the turn and was empty. SUSIKIN vied for the lead two wide and in between rivals by the half mile marker, then was inside the trio on the turn, and weakened in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Positive Force
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed up inside, rated back turn, swung 5 wide, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Susikin
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied between horses, inside turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Terpeye
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun early, angled out 1/8, closed gap,

ENTRY.NAME: South House
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 3 wide, bid between horses, shift 4 wide, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Melodious Singer
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace 4 wide, bid 3 wide, clear 3/16, caught late

ENTRY.NAME: Katy the Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, advanced 3 wide turn, came 4 wide, closed,up late

ENTRY.NAME: Roses From Heaven
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 4 wide turn, came 6 wide, late rally,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 10800. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 9 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ICE COLD GOLD was well placed early on the inside, made a two wide bid on the turn and was clear leaving the turn, then drew out to prove best under mild right handed crop urging. LOIS'S CAUSE was settled early, three wide by the quarter pole, shifted in nearing the furlong marker and finished well on the inside. SAKARI set the pace on the inside, then angled out leaving the turn and faded. MISS REMMIA chased the pace three to four wide, came six wide into the lane and hade no kick. LET'S CELEBRATE was reserved early, five wide by the quarter pole and had no rally. MASKED HEROINE stalked the pace three wide and weakened. TALENTED TAPPER was off a step slow and not a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Let's Celebrate
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, 5 wide 1/4 pole, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Ice Cold Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed inside, bid 2 wide 1/4, drew clear stretch, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Masked Heroine
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Remmia
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-4 wide, came 6 wide, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Lois's Cause
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, came 3 wide, shift in, finished well inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Sakari
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, angled out upper, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Talented Tapper
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, no factor,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 88. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 19000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $16,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000 AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since January 9 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since December 9 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: C C'S KINGDOM set the pace along the inside, was well handled and drew out leaving the turn, then was given a right handed reminder by the sixteenth marker and then ridden out to the wire to prove much the best. RUNYONESQUE was five wide into the first turn, rated along and made a four wide move on the turn, could not go with the winner in the lane while being clearly second best. TUCKERTON BAY stalked the winner early, between rivals at the half mile marker, then shuffled back on the turn, shifted out and came five wide into the lane and was along for the show award. DATHOSS was rated early, made a middle move on the inside on the backstretch, but weakened in the lane and lost the show award. SOUL STORY lacked a rally. FACTOTUM stalked the pace four to three wide and tired. BOKERMIN failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: C C's Kingdom
ENTRY.OWNER: Chircop Steven Ross Eric and Frost Jill
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, well handled, drew off stretch, mild drive

ENTRY.NAME: Tuckerton Bay
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, between 1/2, shuffled, came 5 wide, got 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Soul Story
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled back, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Dathoss
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated early, middle move inside, weakened, lost 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Bokermin
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Runyonesque
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5 wide first turn, rated 4 wide, bid 4 wide, no match, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Factotum
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 4-3 wide, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 46. Maiden Claiming Purse 18100. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000, if for $14,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FIVEALARM FREAKOUT was away alertly to set the paced in the two path, then was in the three path midway on the turn while clear, came three wide into the lane and drew off on the left lead, and then was ridden out and shown the crop to wire to prove much the best. FAIRVIEW hopped at the start, then steadied around the five eighths marker, saved ground on the turn and rallied well for the place award, no match to the winner. FINISHING TOUCH rushed up the inside to stalk the winner by the half mile marker, then shifted out on the turn and swung out four wide leaving the turn and was empty, held show. OUTSPEND broke outwardly at the start, stalked the pace three wide and weaklened. APRILS LUCK chased the pace four wide and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Fivealarm Freakout
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace 2 wide, 3 wide upper, drew off, ridden out,

ENTRY.NAME: Finishing Touch
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed inside, swung 4 wide upper stretch, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Aprils Luck
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 4 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Outspend
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke outwardly, stalked pace 3 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Fairview
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, steadied 5/8, inside turn, rallied for place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 11800. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 9 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since December 9 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VIOLENT PASS was well placed on the inside, made a inside bid leaving the turn, then slowly edged away to prove best under a drive. DREAMERS REWARD set the pace while in the two path, dug in in the lane but could not hold off the winner, second best. SASSY LAD stumbled at the start, settled and was four wide on the turn, came six wide into the lane and had a late rally. TIZ HANDSOME pressed the pace and made a three wide bid on the turn but faded in the drive. THE LITTLE SPROUT was settled early, saved ground on the turn, swung out five wide leaving the turn, then was bumped hard and sideways by the furlong marker and finished evenly. CALLYOURIGHTBACK passed the tiring rivals. SINGLINO was reserved between rivals on the turn and had no rally. KAZTHAROS chased the pace four wide, then lugged in by the furlong marker and weakened. EASY STRIDE failed to menace. SPEED SLOT showed little.

ENTRY.NAME: Callyourightback
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled back, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: The Little Sprout
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, inside turn, swung 5 wide, bumped hard 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Singlino
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, between horses turn, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Kaztharos
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 4 wide, lugged in 1/8, bumped rival, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Violent Pass
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed inside, bid inside, edged away, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Sassy Lad
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled start, 4 wide turn, came 6 wide, rallied

ENTRY.NAME: Speed Slot
ENTRY.COMMENT: showed little,

ENTRY.NAME: Dreamers Reward
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace 2 wide, dug in stretch, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Tiz Handsome
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 3 wide, bid 3 wide, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Easy Stride
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 71. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 19000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $16,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000 AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-win ners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since January 9 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since December 9 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SPECTACULLARI was reserved early on the inside, advanced on the turn on the in side, steadied slightly by the quarter pole, shifted out and made a four wide bid leaving the turn to take over, then was clear leaving the furlong marker, then wandered the final sixteenth but held on to prove best, driving. MORE RANSOM was rated along the inside, made a two wide bid on the turn to gain a short advantage leaving the quarter pole, then could not go with the winner leaving the turn, angled out by the sixteenth marker and came again to just miss. ISTHATYOURHARLEY was reserved early, advanced on the turn and came three wide into the lane but flattened out. ADMONISH was void of early speed and passed the tiring rivals. PAYNT BY NUMBER set the early pace and drew off on the backstretch, then was headed by the quarter pole and gave way. HOLD ME CLOSER was settled early and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Admonish
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: More Ransom
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated inside, bid 2 wide turn, angled out 1/16, came again,missed

ENTRY.NAME: Spectacullari
ENTRY.OWNER: McClay Thomas G Sweigart Dennis and Cullari Salvatore
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved inside, advanced rail, steadied 1/4, bid 4 wide, held

ENTRY.NAME: Paynt by Number
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, drew off backstretch, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Hold Me Closer
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Isthatyourharley
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved 3 wide, advanced turn, came 3 wide, flattened out,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 10800. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE AUGUST 9. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 9 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CALL THE PO PO tracked the pace and made a four wide move on the turn, drew clear in the stretch to prove best under a drive. STARSHIP REINA set the pace on the inside and was headed by the quarter pole, kept on to the wire to be clearly second best. BRITESIDEOFTHEROAD pressed the pace three wide and faded, bested rest. MEMPHIS MAFIA chased the pace from between horses and three wide, came four wide into the lane and weakened. CONGRATS ANSWER threw head at the start, settled back, four to five wide on the turn and had no late rally. SLEEPY N JOYFUL showed speed on the inside, then steadied at the nine sixteenths and dropped back. FAIRY DUST chased the pace in between rivals and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Congrats Answer
ENTRY.COMMENT: threw head start, 4 wide turn, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Sleepy N Joyful
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed inside, steadied 9/16, dropped back,

ENTRY.NAME: Fairy Dust
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace between horses, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Starship Reina
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, headed 1/4, no match, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Britesideoftheroad
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 3 wide, faded, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Memphis Mafia
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 3 wide, came 4 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Call the Po Po
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 4 wide, bid 4 wide, drew clear, driving,
